name: Death Boulder Bones
blurb: DBB is an innovative runner where you control the environment instead of the character. Featured on The Next Game Boss!

rewards.reward: THE EXPLORER: \u2022 A Digital Copy of Death Boulder Bones, plus enough in-game-currency to unlock all 50 levels. Woah!

THE TRAILBLAZER: \u2022 A digital copy of the game, all 50 levels, and an additional 500 in-game coins for buying powerups and other outfits. \u2022 Plus, receive an exclusive in-game ninja outfit! Mo' cash. Mo' ninjas. Word.
THE PIONEER: \u2022 Beta access on Mac / PC! \u2022 Access to a special forum where you can give direct input to the devs! Plus, all of the above tiers.

THE MOBILE PIONEER: \u2022 Beta access on mobile devices (iOS and Android)! You will be added to our device portal, so your iOS version is free! \u2022 Plus, all of the outfits and coinage from the above tiers. Rockin'!

THE ADVENTURER: \u2022 A thank-you postcard, signed by your friends at Grandendroit! (hold onto that, it'll be worth something some day) \u2022 An exclusive pirate skin to do battle with that nifteh ninja skin! \u2022 Beta access + forum, and all of the previous coinage and outfits. \u2022 But wait, there's more! Your name will be forever etched in the credits as one of our key backers! Fantasmagorical!

THE COLLECTOR: \u2022 Awesome Death Boulder Bones tee shirt! You'll be looking stylin' in black on white. \u2022 Get a custom doodle on your postcard! \u2022 Add a nifty-matic zombie to the pirate and ninja skins (zombies are in now!) \u2022 Plus you'll get all the in-game currency, beta access, and your name in the credits from previous tiers. The swag, it overwhelms!

THE ART AFICIONADO: \u2022 Get a physical art book of all the in-game cutscenes so you can relive the hilarity anytime; dedicated to YOU with a custom ink-sketch on the inside cover by Darrell Atienza! \u2022 Never worry about in-game monies again, with a massive 2,500 coin wallet! \u2022 Not to mention, you'll get all the skins, the beta access, your name in the credits, and that nifty post-card! Just what are you going to do with all this stuff?

THE DOCTOR: \u2022 You will receive a 6" tall sandstone model of the man himself, Dr. Indianapolis Bones! He can weigh down papers, stare at you from your desk, get thrown into lava, whatever you desire! \u2022 Not to mention, you will get all the in-game currency, exclusive skins, beta access, and thank-you card from previous tiers AND you will be thanked in the credits as a very special high level backer! I can't handle the wonderfulness!

THE BONES: \u2022 Receive all of the gifts from the previous level: figurine, coinage, N,P+Z skins, beta access, postcard, your name in the credits \u2022 Plus, you'll receive all of the awesome swag from the other tiers: the sweet tee shirt, and a HARDCOVER version of the art book,with your custom sketch! I'm blinded by the sheen!

THE SCULPTOR: \u2022 Have we mentioned that we love you? In thanks, Seth Roble will make you a custom vinyl figure, in his iconic style, of absolutely any humanoid character! Hooray!  \u2022 That will go great with your tee shirt, art book, sandstone Dr. Bones, NPZ skins, doodle-card, beta access, mega-monies, and your name in black and white as a super-generous $500+ level backer! I'm so excited for you!

THE GUARDIAN SPIRIT: \u2022 You're so awesome, you're saving Bones single-handedly! Your likeness will be featured in the game, imposed on one of the NPCs! \u2022 Plus, your name will be included in the credits as the most generous of backers! \u2022 The tee shirt! \u2022 Sandstone figure! \u2022 NPZ skins! \u2022 Postcard with drawing! \u2022 Beta! \u2022 Forum! \u2022 2,500 shinies! \u2022 Could there be more?

THE IMMORTAL: \u2022 Let us steal your ideas to make Death Boulder Bones better! Design a level on paper, a new power-up, or other mechanic and have it implemented in-game! \u2022 And of course, you will receive all of the benefits from the previous tiers, including the iOS beta access, but not Seth's custom figure. Finally, you can die happy!

THE DESIGNER: Conceive a simple game concept and have it made for you by our expert game jam team in 48 hours! Join us via Google Hangout to act as the lead designer during this time. Plus, you will get all IP rights to the game! Woah, epic opportunity! \u2022 AND your name will be enshrined in the credits in a super-sized super-snazzy font of your choice, as one of the game's key backers. \u2022 Plus, for your unbelievable level of support, you will receive all of the gifts from all of the above tiers as well, including: the iOS beta access, the custom game mechanic, AND the vinyl figure! Oh Frabjous Day!

THE AWESOME: \u2022 Wow. You are like epically awesome. No, even more awesome than that. You are so awesome, that the antagonist from Death Boulder Bones will be modeled and named after you! \u2022 PLUS, so that we may bathe in your awesomeness, we will fly you from the lower 48 states to us in San Francisco, for lunch with the team and a weekend away. \u2022 EVEN BETTER get to hang out with us for a day as we develop Death Boulder Bones. \u2022 FINALLY you will be showered with every single one of the gifts from every single tier above. May we be worthy of your awesomeness!
